ActNational Defence Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN FORCES OVERSEAS SCHOOLS REGULATIONS by updating sections 9 and 10 concerning allowances and benefits payable to overseas teachers so that they reference the new regulations in Chaper 10 of the Compensation and Benefits Instructions for the Canadian Forces.
